H0.text: Who composed the opera Cosi Fan Tutte. Gioachino Rossini

H1.text: Who composed the opera Cosi Fan Tutte. Christoph Willibald Gluck

H2.text: Who composed the opera Cosi Fan Tutte. Niccolò Paganini

H3.text: Who composed the opera Cosi Fan Tutte. Mosart

A4.text: Così fan tutte, ossia La scuola degli amanti (Women are like that, or The School for Lovers), K. 588, is an opera buffa in two acts by Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart.
